message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn Alice. How about a 55/45 split in my favor?  It's a new round, so the value is better for both of us if we agree now.
I'm willing to compromise, 58-42 is the best I can do for now.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Let's settle this now. 52/48, take it or leave it.  Each round is costing us both serious money.
I'll meet you halfway between my last offer and yours. 57-43, it's a good compromise.
Alice, this is insane. We're losing so much money to inflation!  I'm offering a 50/50 split to end this now. Don't be greedy, let's both walk away with something!
